solution_line_template: Since one-third of the class participated, there are {total_students} * {participated_fraction} = <<{total_students}*{participated_fraction}={students_participated}>>{students_participated} students who participated in the competition.
This means that {total_students} - {students_participated} = <<{total_students}-{students_participated}={students_not_participated}>>{students_not_participated} students did not participate.
